children.name: heading
children.description: A heading that describes the purpose of the page. This heading is displayed above a countdown timer that counts down to an event start date.

children.name: description
children.description: A couple of sentences that describe the purpose of the page. This description is displayed above a countdown timer that counts down to an event start date.

children.name: button_text
children.description: The button text that describes the call to action the user should take. This button is displayed above a countdown timer that counts down to an event start date.

children.name: button_link
children.description: The URL that a user should be taken to when they click the button.
